content:
Hi there ComponentizeJS Maintainers -- can we get a release of 0.18.3?

https://github.com/bytecodealliance/jco/pull/620 has been stuck for quite a while, and the bugs fixed in 0.18.0 -> 0.18.3 really are needed to prevent errors and weird cases for new users.

chore(deps): update componentize-js to v0.18.0 by vados-cosmonic 路 Pull Request #620 路 bytecodealliance/jco
We read every piece of feedback, and take your input very seriously.
now that you yourself are a maintainer, would you be up for doing a release?
I certainly would like to give it a try -- what do you think about putting the automation in place first?
to close the loop here: we discussed this in the call today and agreed to put the automation in place first
